title: PCAP Validation with User-Friendly Error Messages
description: Add pre-upload PCAP validation to detect incompatible files (synthetic/educational PCAPs) and display detailed, user-friendly error messages explaining why the file cannot be analyzed and suggesting alternatives (Wireshark).
acceptance_criteria: Validation detects 'The Ultimate PCAP' as incompatible
Normal PCAPs pass validation without overhead (< 500ms)
Error display is integrated in UI (not just a toast)
Error messages explain what's wrong and what to do
Unit tests achieve 100% coverage of validator
